name: Full Cream Milk  - 500ml
description: Rich, creamy, and packed with nutrients, full cream milk has a higher fat content (around 3.5%), making it ideal for drinking, cooking, and making dairy products like yogurt and cheese. Available in 250ml, 500ml, 1L.

name: Cheddar Cheese - 250g
description: Aged cheese with a sharp, tangy flavor, perfect for sandwiches, burgers, and cheese platters. Available in 250g, 500g, 1kg.

name: Toned Milk - 250ml
description: Toned milk contains less fat (about 3%) than full cream milk, offering a balance of taste and health benefits for everyday consumption. Available in 250ml, 500ml, 1L.

name: Greek Yogurt - 500g
description: Strained yogurt with higher protein content and creamy texture. Perfect for breakfast, smoothies, or as a healthy snack option. Available in 250g, 500g, 1kg.

name: Salted Butter - 250g
description: Premium quality salted butter made from pasteurized cream, perfect for cooking, baking, and spreading on bread. Available in 250g, 500g, 1kg.

name: Fresh Curd - 250ml
description: Homestyle curd with a smooth, creamy texture and mild flavor. Rich in probiotics and perfect for daily consumption. Available in 250ml, 500ml, 1L.

name: Pure Ghee - 500ml
description: Traditional clarified butter made from pure cow's milk. Add authentic flavor to your dishes with this premium quality ghee. Available in 250ml, 500ml, 1L.

name: Whipping Cream - 250ml
description: High-fat cream perfect for creating fluffy dessert toppings, rich sauces, and decadent desserts. Available in 250ml, 500ml, 1L.

name: Vanilla Ice Cream - 500ml
description: Classic vanilla ice cream made with real vanilla beans. Creamy, smooth, and perfect for any occasion. Available in 250ml, 500ml, 1L.

name: Chocolate Pudding - 250ml
description: Rich and creamy chocolate pudding made with premium cocoa. A delightful dessert for chocolate lovers. Available in 250ml, 500ml, 1L.

name: Mozzarella Cheese - 250g
description: Stretchy, mild-flavored cheese perfect for pizzas, lasagna, and other Italian dishes. Made from fresh milk. Available in 250g, 500g, 1kg.

name: Strawberry Yogurt - 250ml
description: Creamy yogurt blended with fresh strawberries and a hint of sweetness. A delicious and healthy snack option. Available in 250ml, 500ml, 1L.

name: ButterScotch - 500ml
description: A buttery, caramel-like treat with a rich and smooth finish. Sweet and comforting. Available in 250ml, 500ml, 1L.

name: Vanilla - 250ml
description: A classic and creamy flavor made with rich vanilla beans. Smooth, sweet, and universally loved. Available in 250ml, 500ml, 1L.

name: Cookies and Cream - 250ml
description: Creamy vanilla base mixed with chunks of chocolate cookies. A crunchy and creamy favorite. Available in 250ml, 500ml, 1L.
